thread.title: Chris Rijnbeek
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Chris Rijnbeek

author: Chris Rijnbeek
title: Chris Rijnbeek
text: By accident, I ordered the wrong jacket. Returning was no problem and after a couple of weeks I ordered the right jacket, which luckily for me was on sale at that time.
